task.title: Assembling The Machine
task.shortdesc: This will introduce the proper way to assemble your class' ice cream machine.

taskbody.prereq:
Gather the following components of the machine:
Cap with Measurement Cup
Easy-Lock Lid with Ingredient Spout
Mixing Arm
Freezer Bowl
Control Panel
Base

step.cmd: Wipe all components except the freezer bowl clean with a damp cloth.

cmd.b: WARNING: Do NOT immerse the base in water.

step.cmd: Place the freezer bowl in the center of the base.

substep.cmd: It should fit snugly in the hollow.

step.cmd: Place the mixing arm into the freezer bowl.

substep.cmd: This should rest in the center of the bowl with the circle side facing up.

step.cmd: Orient the easy-lock lid with ingredient spout slightly right of center.
Turn the easy-lock lid with ingredient spout clockwise to lock it to the base.

substep.cmd: The lid may seem loose, this will not impact performance.

step.cmd: Plug the unit into the nearest power source, and prepare to pour your ice cream mixture!
